price: Tena awe miongoni mwa walio amini na wakausiana kusubiri na wakausiana kuhurumiana.
arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡمَرۡحَمَةِ
footnotes: Tena awe pamoja na hayo miongoni mwa wenye Imani wanao usiana na wenzao kwa subira na kuoneana huruma.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma kāna mina alladhīna āmanū watawāṣaw bil-ṣabri watawāṣaw bil-marḥamati
